div.p: Hi. I'm Jeff Richter, Assistant Director of Auxiliary Services here at DeSales University.
Today I'm going to give you a little look around the University Center here on campus.
The first area I want to show you is our Conferences and Events Center.
Here, every year we do thousands of camps, conferences and special events.
On a day-to-day basis, we're serving our internal population,
as well as external clients.
We also have a full-service catering department to service the conference center.
The next thing I want to show you is our dining hall.
This is our main dining hall on campus.
In this dining hall we can seat between 450 and 500 students
and during the school year, we feed three meals a day.
We have a food court system with five different stations to serve our undergraduate population.
Here in the University Center you'll find the Campus Store.
The Campus Store is your one-stop shop for all your textbooks,
school supplies and DeSales logo item needs.
The Campus Store is usually open Monday through Friday and Saturday mornings.
Also in the University Center, you'll find the University Card office
where you report to get your student ID.
It's important that you get your student ID because you'll use it
for a multitude of things on campus.
